surfaces

Class ParametricSurface3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • surfaces.Surface3D
      • surfaces.ParametricSurface3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Labelizable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Spiral, Torus

    public abstract class ParametricSurface3D
extends Surface3D
    Abstract extension of the Surface3D class which is used for parametric surfaces.
